title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the EmployeeVoiceAmplifier platform, including user roles (e.g., employees, managers, HR, executives), features (e.g., idea submission, upvoting, commenting, notifications), and workflows (e.g., idea review, prioritization, implementation tracking). Consider accessibility, data privacy, and security requirements. Identify integration points with existing systems (e.g., HR, project management tools).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integration points.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, build tools, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement User Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop user authentication and authorization mechanisms for different user roles.

title: Design and Develop User Interfaces
description: Design and implement user interfaces for employees, managers, and administrators.

title: Implement Idea Submission and Tracking
description: Develop features for employees to submit ideas and track their progress.

title: Implement Concern Reporting and Resolution
description: Develop features for employees to report concerns and track their resolution.

title: Implement Notifications and Alerts
description: Develop mechanisms for notifying relevant stakeholders about new ideas, concerns, and updates.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for the platform.

title: Implement Reporting and Analytics
description: Develop reporting and analytics features for tracking platform usage and performance.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to relevant security and compliance standards.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish testing strategies, frameworks, and processes for ensuring the platform's quality.

title: Develop User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user guides, training materials, and support resources for the platform.

title: Plan and Execute Deployment and Rollout
description: Develop a deployment strategy and execute the rollout of the platform to production environments.
dependencies: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
